title: ➤Awesome 3 Bed in Eagle Hill! Great Renovation! Half Broker Fee!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 248881519', 'Rent: $3,125 / Month', 'Beds: 3', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Renovated 3 bed/1 bath unit in Eagle Hill neighborhood available for a 9/1 move-in!', 'Short walk to the Greenway, public transportation, restaurants, Piers Park, and much more!', 'This unit features:', '- Hardwood floors', '- Updated kitchen', '- Stainless steel appliances', '- Granite counters', '- Tile bath', '- Recessed lighting', '- HVAC gas heat and central air', '- Laundry in building', 'Basement storage unit included!', 'Shared backyard.', 'Pet friendly on a case by case basis ($150/month for dogs and $75/month for cats).', "Reach out now and don't miss out on this unit, it won't last!", 'Please email Terry or respond to this ad to schedule a showing and get more info on this unit and other apartment options!', 'Email: Terry @ benjaminapartments .', 'com (Remove the spaces)', 'Search Boston’s largest selection of apartments at https://ygl.is/terry-zhu-agent', 'Nearby transportation:', 'Bus: 93 Bunker Hill St @ Concord St (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 89/93 Bunker Hill St @ Polk St (0.06 mi)', 'Ferry: Charlestown Ferry Charlestown (0.49 mi)', 'Bus: 92 Warren St @ Church St (0.21 mi)', 'Subway: Orange Line Community College (0.50 mi)', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC makes a good faith effort to post accurate photographs and descriptions of the apartments listed for rent, but because the information is supplied by third parties and is not independently verified, we cannot always guarantee its accuracy.', 'Rental rates, listing information and availability are subject to error and change, and listed rates may be lower than actual rates due to incentives offered by landlords.', 'All apartments have a one month brokerage fee to be paid by renter unless otherwise noted.', 'Additionally, the apartment advertised may no longer be available for rent.', 'Benjamin Apartments LLC fully supports the principles of the Fair Housing Act and the Equal Opportunity Act.']
